findings.title: ST - Stops Transactions
findings.description: The owner can enable transactions for all users, but once enabled, they cannot be disabled again.

findings.title: MEE - Missing Events Emission
findings.description: The contract performs actions and state mutations from external methods that do not result in the emission of events.

findings.title: RVD - Redundant Variable Declaration
findings.description: The contract declares certain variables that are not used in a meaningful way by the contract.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity style guide for naming conventions.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: The contract has dead code that is written but never executed or reached during normal contract execution.

findings.title: L11 - Unnecessary Boolean equality
findings.description: The code compares boolean values with true or false, which is unnecessary.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured without proper checks for zero values.

findings.title: L18 - Multiple Pragma Directives
findings.description: The contract includes multiple conflicting pragma directives.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The `^` symbol indicates that any version of Solidity compatible with the specified version can be used to compile the contract.
